channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ID

item.title: Report X-2023120425
item.description:
Report X-2023120425

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-15T21:09:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-05
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking on van line. QA was made aware and package was contained in hazmat tote. DescribePack: Lids on plastic containers came partially loose DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was contained in hazmat tote with a liner.
